
- Aquarium - a Bitsy game created by Marina Diez 

# BITSY VERSION 4.6

! ROOM_FORMAT 1

PAL 0

ROOM 0
i,h,h,h,h,h,11,12,13,14,h,h,h,h,h,g

DLG ITM_0
You found a nice warm cup of tea

DLG SPR_0
I'm a ray! eey! eey! 

DLG SPR_1
I'm a blowfish! ish! ish! 

DLG SPR_2
I'm an octopus! Puss! Puss! 

DLG SPR_3
I'm a jellyfish! jeeell! jeeell! 

DLG ITM_1
The big, big ocean. Feel it. Taste it. Enjoy it. 

DLG ITM_2
Do you feel it? It's the mild water in your skin. 

DLG ITM_3
Just swim like a fish. 

DLG ITM_4
Fishes, fishes! Fishes everywhere! 

DLG ITM_5
Are that whales singing? Jesus, it's beautiful. 

DLG ITM_6
It could be easy a thousand fishes here. 

DLG ITM_7
Jellyfishes scare me. 

DLG ITM_8
I never thought that a moon fish could be soooo huge. Wow. 

DLG ITM_9
These whales are amazing. Are they dancing? 

DLG ITM_a
Gloops! gloops! bubbles! bubbles! 

DLG ITM_b
Wooow! Is that a whale shark? 

DLG ITM_c
Turtles! I never saw one until now! 

DLG ITM_d
Just relax & enjoy the walk :)
